message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product for a limited time. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $18000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can see you're serious about making a deal. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $22000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. Would you be willing to go up to $22000?
I'm still interested in the product, but $22000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $19500. Can you meet me at that price?

I can see you're making a serious effort to reach a deal, Bob. However, I'm still not sure if $19500 is enough to cover my costs. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get closer to my target price. How about we meet at $21000?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go up to $21000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $20250. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get a bit closer to my target price. How about we meet at $20500?
I'm really close to my budget, but I'm still not willing to go up to $20500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $20250. Can you meet me at that price?
